Teaching Service

Multimodal Machine Learning
CMU 11-777
Fall 2023: Teaching Assistant, Carnegie Mellon University (course website)

  • ○ I co-hosted one lecture for future directions of multimodal machine learning, mentored groups of students working on class projects and graded homeworks.
Advanced Topics in Multimodal Machine Learning
CMU 11-877
Spring 2024: Teaching Assistant, Carnegie Mellon University (course website)
